palasso 0.0.1
  • functions
  • vignette
  • article
  • news

Scope

Sparse regression with paired covariates (extending glmnet).

Installation

Install the current release from CRAN, or the latest development version from GitHub:

install.packages("palasso")
#install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rauschenberger/palasso")

Reference

A Rauschenberger, I Ciocanea-Teodorescu, RX Menezes, MA Jonker, and MA van de Wiel (2018). “Sparse regression with paired covariates”. Manuscript in preparation.
